name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
C++ Developer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance, multithreaded applications within compliance-driven environments. Proficient in **C++ 17**, **STL**, **Boost**, and experienced in **C#** for developing robust software solutions on both **Windows** and **Linux** platforms. Strong background in network programming and algorithm design, ensuring efficient and effective software development. Leveraging a solid foundational knowledge in database management systems including **PostgreSQL** and **MS SQL Server**. Excellent command of English, enabling clear communication of complex ideas.

Originally skilled in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with hands-on expertise in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** for full stack development. Proven experience in building AI/ML-powered platforms that support predictive analytics and real-time processing, deploying applications in cloud environments such as **AWS** and **Azure**, and creating microservices and CI/CD pipelines.
